dcterms:description: VQA v2.0 is an updated version of VQA v1.0 that reduces data bias and contains question-image pairs collected from Microsoft COCO dataset, with a focus on evaluating different types of questions.
dcterms:title: VQA v2.0

dcterms:creator: Kushal Kaﬂe
Christopher Kanan
dcterms:description: TDIUC is a dataset that contains 1.6 million questions divided into 12 categories, designed to address the bias problem in VQA v2.0.
dcterms:title: TDIUC

dcterms:creator: Tsung-Yi Lin
Michael Maire
Serge Belongie

dcterms:description: Microsoft COCO is a large-scale dataset that provides a rich set of images with annotations for various tasks including object detection and image captioning.
dcterms:title: Microsoft COCO

dcterms:creator: Justin Johnson
Bharath Hariharan
Laurens van der Maaten
Li Fei-Fei
C Lawrence Zitnick
Ross Girshick
dcterms:description: CLEVR is a diagnostic dataset designed for compositional language and elementary visual reasoning, providing a controlled environment for testing visual reasoning algorithms.
dcterms:title: CLEVR
